Package helper

Class Time

java.lang.Object
helper.Time
public abstract class Time extends Object
Helper abstract class contains functions relating to time conversions.

    • isNotDuringBusinessHours

      public static boolean isNotDuringBusinessHours(Timestamp time)
      Checks if a time is between start and end business hours, and if the time is from Monday to Friday.
      Parameters:
      time - Time in UTC
      Returns:
      Boolean if the time is during business hours.

    • isOverlappingAppointment

      public static boolean isOverlappingAppointment(Timestamp time, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> appointmentList)
      Checks if there are overlapping appointments from the appointmentList and time.
      Parameters:
      time - Time to be checked
      appointmentList - Appointment List containing Appointment objects to be checked against time
      Returns:
      Boolean if there are overlapping appointments
